mapper.insert: insert into operate_log (id, operate_name, operate_desc, operate_time, operate_param, username, user_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operateParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update operate_log set operate_name = #{operateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_desc = #{operateDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operate_param = #{operateParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, operate_name, operate_desc, operate_time, operate_param, username, user_id from operate_log
select operate_name, operate_desc, operate_time, operate_param, username, user_id from operate_log order by id desc
